analysis.description:
FRNCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x39fe3b1006fa3eac3afd06d7fd406f48d86a0d5e.sol#296-324) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenPoolAddress,beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0x39fe3b1006fa3eac3afd06d7fd406f48d86a0d5e.sol#319-322)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/16/0x39fe3b1006fa3eac3afd06d7fd406f48d86a0d5e.sol#4-5)
